item.description:
Hi Folks-
Are you unsure of the next steps toward your professional goals? Are you still discovering what those goals are? Let's take it back to basics with this interactive workshop which will include writing prompts, refreshments (depending on our location) and networking. Bring pens, paper, your business cards, and an open mind.

Whether you are currently employed, in between positions or seeking a new opportunity in the nonprofit sector, this workshop will support you in getting clarity about what you want and your next steps.

This will be facilitated by members of our new Leadership Team!

Here are the directions (for walking, public transit and driving):
http://maps.google.co...

I hope you can join us!
~Monique
item.name: Scribbling on the Sketchpad: A Career Brainstorming Workshop
